document_data.name: Phrenic creature
document_data.mainbody: '''Phrenic creatures''' were otherwise ordinary creatures that had psionic abilities.
document_data.Abilities: Phrenic creatures manifested psionic abilities ranging in power from ''[[defensive precognition]]'' and ''[[force screen]]'' to ''[[ultrablast]]''. Additionally, they had some inherent resistant to psionic power.
document_data.History: After the destruction of [[Jhaamdath]], psionic power leaking dozen of once-famed psionic swords and artifacts that lay beneath the stone and [[sand]] of the seafloor warped many local sea creatures into phrenic creatures.<ref>
